original_text: In measure, when it shooteth forth, thou wilt debate with it: he stayeth his rough wind in the day of the east wind.
korean_text: 주께서 백성을 적당하게 견책하사 쫓아내실 때에 동풍 부는 날에 폭풍으로 그들을 옮기셨느니라

sentences.original_text: In measure, when it shooteth forth,
sentences.korean_translation: 분량에 따라, 그것이 싹이 틀 때,

sentences.original_text: in the day of the east wind.
